title: 07/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/13/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the rapid rise of Shohei Ohtani to superstardom before tonight's All-Star game and why he's already better than Babe Ruth. He analyzes USA basketball after suffering another loss as they prepare for the Olympics and why we have fallen behind in international competitions. He also explains what it takes to be an elite QB in the NFL today and why they don't always come from where you'd expect. Plus, Hall of Fame and MLB on FOX analyst John Smoltz joins the show

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
